casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Efrain JOHNSON. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 21, 2016.

Glenn W. Falk, assigned counsel, Madison, in support of the petition.

Susan C. Marks, supervisory assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 165 Conn.App. 255, 138 A.3d 1108 (2016), is denied.
